about_the_game:
Embark on a chilling journey into darkness with "Skinless: The Horror Story Quest." Dive into a narrative-driven horror experience that blends psychological tension with thrilling gameplay.



Explore hauntingly beautiful environments, from the eerie halls of a forsaken hospital to the desolate streets of a post-apocalyptic city, rendered in stunning detail. Encounter a cast of intriguing characters and unravel the truth behind the epidemic that has plunged the world into chaos.


Face off against terrifying enemies, including zombies and other horrors born from the darkness of the human mind. Test your skills with challenging gameplay that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Solve puzzles, evade enemies, and make tough decisions that will affect the outcome of the story.

Immerse yourself in the game's atmosphere with a haunting soundtrack that sets the tone for your journey into darkness. For an even more immersive experience, "Skinless: The Horror Story Quest".

Prepare to face your fears in "Skinless: The Horror Story Quest," where every corner holds a new terror and every decision could be your last. Are you ready to uncover the truth and survive the horror that awaits?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel \ AMD Quad-Core 2.3GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: In "Skinless The Horror Story Quest," journey through a nightmarish blend of reality and hallucination. Wake up in a haunting hospital, face your fears in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by zombies, and confront the doctor behind the epidemic. Can you escape the darkness within and without?
